PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1994-20621994-12-140,  ,  ,  ,  ,  CITIZENSHIP
PrecisAmendment to the IMMIGRATION REGULATIONS, 1978 bringing paragraph 19(4)(p) into harmony with NAFTA, allowing nationals of Mexico and the United States who have legal status in Canada as visitors to apply from within Canada for an employment authorization to the extent that fully reciprocal treatment is accorded to Canadian nationals in the United States and Mexico.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 1994-0773 Publication Date: 1994-12-28
Attachments
